import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Heart, Tag, UserMinus, UserPlus, Search } from "react-feather"; export const FriendRequestDropdown = () => { let [isActive, setisActive] = useState(); useEffect(()=> { const exitClick =() => { if(isActive) setisActive(false); } document.addEventListener("click", exitClick()) return document.removeEventListener("click", exitClick()) },[isActive]) return (
setisActive(!isActive)} href="javascript:void(0);">
